headline.main: In China's Rustbelt Towns, Displaced Coal, Steel Workers Lose Hope and Voice
headline.print_headline: In China's Rustbelt Towns, Displaced Coal, Steel Workers Lose Hope and Voice

lead_paragraph: After protests by unpaid coal miners made headlines around the world last year as China's parliament was meeting, a $15 billion assistance fund offered by the ruling Communist Party became a symbol of the government's need to ensure social stability.
